revision.text: ==Bill's Errand== {| class="wikitable" |+ Bill's Errand ! Type !! Requirement !! Reward |- | Prerequisite || Defeat the [[Gyms#Kanto|Cinnabar Island Gym]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Celio in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|One Island]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Game Corner Owner in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Two Island]] || N/A |- | Defeat [[Temporary Battles#Kanto|Temporary Battles]] || Defeat [[Temporary Battles#Kanto|Biker Goon 1]][[File:Biker_Goon.png|30px]], [[Temporary Battles#Kanto|Biker Goon 2]][[File:Biker_Goon.png|30px]] and [[Temporary Battles#Kanto|Biker Goon 3]][[File:Biker_Goon.png|30px]] || N/A |- | Defeat [[Temporary Battles#Kanto|Temporary Battles]] || Defeat [[Temporary Battles#Kanto|Cue Ball Paxton]][[File:Cue_Ball_Paxton.png|30px]] || N/A |- | Clear Dungeon || Clear [[Berry Forest]]. || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Game Corner Owner in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Two Island]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Celio in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|One Island]] || 1,000 {{Questpoints}} |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
